name: Netsuite Sales Order - Slack omteam Channel
description:
**Trigger:**  When a new sales order is created in Netsuite, a slack notification should go to a new private channel created for OM team - #omteam.

**Description:** Order Management team spend a lot of time tracking saales orders within Netsuite. To make the process more efficient the plan is to alert the OM team on a slack channel created for salesorders (new one). Alert will be based of a saved search.
The saved search needs to be refined with the help of Netsuite team so we specifically look for Sales orders being created.

**Actions:** Fetch all the required data from salesorder, employee, transaction record list and send a slack alert to omteam channel when new sales order is created.

code.name: scheduled_event
code.description: Trigger every 1 days at 04:00:00 PM

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every
extended_input_schema.hint:
Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_at
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger at
extended_input_schema.hint: Set a time to schedule the job.

extended_input_schema.name: start_after
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.

extended_input_schema.name: timezone
extended_input_schema.label: Timezone
extended_input_schema.hint: Select the timezone to use. Leave it blank to use (GMT-08:00) Pacific Time (US & Canada)
